**Example**

```esql
ROW magnitude = 5.2, sign = -9.0
| EVAL result = COPY_SIGN(magnitude, sign)
```

| magnitude:double | sign:double | result:double |
| --- | --- | --- |
| 5.2 | -9.0 | -5.2 |
